metadata.title: CVE-2017-14242 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in don/list.php in Dolibarr version 6.0.0allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the statutparameter.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
